summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a sewer in easements across private property between East 77th Street and East 80th Street, from a connection with the existing sewer in 25th Avenue Northeast to a connection with existing sewer in East 77th Street 100 feet more or less west of 28th Avenue Northeast, and in certain other easements; appropriating money therefor from the Seattle Sewer Bonds 1946 Fund; repealing Ordinance No. 78209, and ratifying and confirming the expenditures made therefrom.
